comment.text: The translation key "Header" is used to display the title of a panel or section in the UI. It appears as a label in a checkbox element and is accompanied by an image to represent the header of the embedding panel.

usage.context:
<CheckboxElement
 label={t("Common:Title")}
 onChange={onHeaderChange}
 isChecked={embeddingConfig.showTitle}
 img={theme.isBase ? HeaderUrl : HeaderDarkUrl}
 title={t("JavascriptSdk:Header")}
 description={t("JavascriptSdk:HeaderDescription")}
 dataTestId="show_title"
 />
 <CheckboxElement
 label={t("JavascriptSdk:SearchFilterAndSort")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "العنوان الرئيسي" (al-'unwan ar-ra'eesi) is technically "main heading", it's a more formal and potentially overly verbose translation for a simple "Header". A more direct and common translation might be better suited.
While "머리글" is a literal translation of "header," it's not the standard terminology used in a technical context like a Javascript SDK. It sounds overly formal and less familiar to developers.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "헤더" (hedeo) which is the commonly used transliteration of 'header' in Korean technical documentation and development circles.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ຫົວຂໍ້ເອກະສານ" (hua kho ekasarn) translates to 'document header' or 'document title'.  The English 'Header' is a more general term, often referring to the header of a JavaScript SDK, not just a document. A more appropriate translation might be "ຫົວ" (hua) or a more contextual translation depending on the specific usage of 'Header'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "ຫົວ" (hua) or a context-specific translation depending on the SDK's documentation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: '页眉' is a literal translation of 'header' and is appropriate in many contexts. However, considering this is likely related to a Javascript SDK, '标题' (title) might be a more accurate and contextually relevant translation, especially if the 'Header' refers to the title of the SDK or a section within it. '页眉' implies a visual header element in a document, which may not be the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '标题' (title) for better contextual accuracy.
